snippet: As people in and out of Congress demand transparency, members of the powerful bipartisan committee say secrecy is needed to build trust and exclude special interests.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Joint Select Committee on Deficit Reduction

lead_paragraph: As people in and out of Congress demand transparency, members of the powerful bipartisan committee say secrecy is needed to build trust and exclude special interests.

headline.main: Many in Both Parties Want a Window Into the Deficit Reduction Panel’s Work
headline.print_headline: Many in Both Parties Want a Window Into the Deficit Reduction Panel’s Work
headline.seo: Deficit Reduction Panel Is Criticized for Its Secrecy
